awards:
第10届釜山国际电影节(2005)
　　善才奖(最佳短片奖) 金泳滥
introduction: An terminally-ill old man is living in a countryside with his daughter, Eunjin who had come back home with her only son after divorcing. One day they have some argument over a trivial thing after a regular checkup in a hospital, and then they take separate ways. The film, , portrays their lives and their individual state of mind evolving from the moment they splits in the street to the moment they have an awkward reunion at home.
